entries.description: CodeWhisperer: Fixes a bug where accepting a recommendation in AWS Cloud9 will trigger another suggestion
Amazon Q: correct code selection range for one-line selections
CodeWhisperer: Security Scan Log output is blank if log level is not "verbose".
Amazon Q Chat: Fixed code block text background
Amazon Q Transform: delete temp files we create when no longer needed
Amazon Q Transform: make copy-dependencies command less error prone
CodeWhisperer: fix incorrect error handling causing TypeError .includes is not a function
Amazon Q: "Transformation Hub" is always visible, even if Transform feature is not enabled or used
CodeWhisperer: add select customization action to notification
feat(sam): python 3.12 support for SAM, lambda
Browser: Enable generic global commands in ellipses menus, e.g. About Toolkit, Report Toolkit Issue, etc.
Commands: Remove redundant 'View Quick Start' command from appearing in non-Cloud9 versions of the toolkit.
Amazon Q, CodeWhisperer: Remove 'Switch Connections' menu item, and only show 'Add new connection' when not signed in.
